error: Integer division. Decimal part will be discarded.
meaning: The user attempted to divide an integer by another integer. The resulting number will be an integer with the decimal/fractional part discarded (not rounded).
fixes: Replace at least one of the operands with a corresponding float. If the number is a literal, do this by adding ".0" to the end; if it's a variable, wrap it in "float()".
If this behavior is intentional, add "@warning_ignore('INTEGER_DIVISION')" before this line to suppress the warning.
